useCase.name: Visiting different components
useCase.description: As a user, I want to visit different components such as boundary, control, entity, database, and collections to understand their functionalities.

mainSequence.step: User visits a boundary component represented by Foo2
User navigates to a control component represented by Foo3
User accesses an entity component represented by Foo4
User interacts with a database represented by Foo5
User explores collections represented by Foo6
